name: vanilla.pools
description:
Vanilla Pools is a basic GameObject pooling system. Object pooling is a great performance optimization for objects you need to create often. Instead of creating new instances all the time, create a set amount and re-use them over and over.

The goal of Pools is to make that as easy as possible to implement. Simply make a new script inheriting from Pool (the pool itself) and another one inheriting from PoolItem (the item you need a lot of) and you're set to go.

Try the Example Pool sample to see it in action.

samples.description: Demonstrates use of Fill, Get, Retire and Drain
